name: On the Peril of Parrots
description:
Guide P.O.L.L.I - the Procedural Operating Layered Linguistic Intelligence - through 100+ challenging puzzles. In order to progress, your task is to transform all available spaces into a single color. Additionally, you have the option to skip puzzles, undo actions, or reset a challenge at any point in the game - all for the small cost of Cookies.



However, "The Scientist" and their diligent "Assistant" are keeping a watchful eye on every move you make. If you find yourself running low on cookies you risk being deemed a failure and having the experiment restarted. So think strategically, plan your moves carefully, and don't let those cookies run out!

Key Features

  • 100+ Challenging Puzzles
  • Unlimited Undos [Technically]
  • Cookies!
